info.title: Codebase RAG API
info.description: Advanced RAG system for large-scale codebase analysis

get.description:
Basic health check endpoint.

Returns basic application health status.

Readiness check endpoint.

Returns whether the application is ready to serve requests.
This includes checking all critical dependencies.

Liveness check endpoint.

Returns whether the application is alive and running.
This is a lightweight check for container orchestration.

Detailed health check endpoint.

Returns comprehensive health information including component status,
performance metrics, and system information.

Get application metrics in Prometheus format.

Returns metrics that can be scraped by Prometheus for monitoring.

Get detailed database status and statistics.

Returns comprehensive information about database health and performance.

Get performance metrics for all components.

Returns detailed performance metrics for monitoring and optimization.

post.description:
Reset performance metrics.

Resets all performance counters and metrics to zero.

get.description:
Get application version information.

Returns version information and build details.

Get enhanced system information for v2.0 architecture.

Returns detailed information about the enhanced components.

Get enhanced embedding system status.

Returns detailed information about the embedding client and CodeBERT support.

Get enhanced repository processor status.

Returns detailed information about the v2.0 processor architecture.

Get comprehensive enhanced system status.

Returns complete overview of the enhanced v2.0 system.

post.description:
Perform semantic search across codebase.

This endpoint performs vector similarity search to find code chunks
semantically similar to the query text.

get.description:
Find chunks similar to a specific chunk.

This endpoint finds code chunks that are semantically similar to a given chunk.

post.description:
Execute a Cypher query against the graph database.

Always return a JSON body (diagnostics on failure) to aid troubleshooting.

get.description:
Get transitive dependencies for a Maven artifact.

This endpoint returns all transitive dependencies for a given Maven artifact,
including dependency paths and depth information.

Get dependency conflicts across repositories.

This endpoint returns information about dependency version conflicts,
optionally filtered by repository.

Get circular dependencies in the system.

This endpoint identifies circular dependencies in the Maven dependency graph.

Get relationships for a code chunk.

This endpoint returns all relationships (calls, inheritance, dependencies)
for a specific code chunk.

Get dependencies between business domains.

This endpoint returns how a specific business domain depends on other domains.

Get most connected Maven artifacts (hub analysis).

This endpoint identifies the most connected artifacts in the dependency graph,
which are often critical components.

Get health analysis for a repository.

This endpoint provides a comprehensive health analysis of a repository,
including dependency health, code quality, and complexity metrics.

Perform hybrid search combining semantic and graph-based results.

This endpoint combines semantic search results with graph-based relationship
analysis to provide more comprehensive search results.

Get query and database statistics.

This endpoint provides statistics about the database contents and query performance.

post.description:
Perform cross-repository analysis.

Analyzes business flows, dependencies, and relationships across multiple repositories.

get.description:
Get list of available repositories with filtering options.

Supports filtering by business domain, framework, and team ownership.

post.description:
Get business flows that span the selected repositories.

Returns business flows with migration planning information.

Get dependencies between selected repositories.

Analyzes cross-repository dependency relationships and strength.

Analyze migration impact across selected repositories.

STANDARDIZED: Returns the canonical multi-repo migration plan schema
(plan_scope, summary, cross_repo, slices, graphql, roadmap, diagnostics).

get.description:
Get integration points for specified repositories.

Identifies external system integrations and data sensitivity.

post.description:
Index a single repository.

This endpoint starts the indexing process for a repository and returns
immediately with a task ID for status tracking.

parameters.name: dry_run

schema.description: Analyze and estimate without writing to Neo4j/Chroma
schema.title: Dry Run

parameters.description: Analyze and estimate without writing to Neo4j/Chroma

post.description:
Index a local repository from filesystem path.

This endpoint indexes a repository from a local filesystem path without
requiring git clone. Returns immediately with a task ID for status tracking.

parameters.name: dry_run

schema.description: Analyze and estimate without writing to Neo4j/Chroma
schema.title: Dry Run

parameters.description: Analyze and estimate without writing to Neo4j/Chroma

post.description:
Index multiple repositories in bulk.

This endpoint processes multiple repositories concurrently with
configurable concurrency limits.

get.description:
Get the status of an indexing task.

This endpoint returns the current status and progress of an indexing task.

Get the status of all indexing tasks.

This endpoint returns the status of all currently tracked indexing tasks.

post.description:
Perform incremental update for a repository.

This endpoint performs an incremental update for a repository,
processing only changed files since the last update.

delete.description:
Delete a repository from the index.

This endpoint removes all indexed data for a repository from both
ChromaDB and Neo4j databases.

post.description:
Filter repositories based on criteria.

This endpoint returns a list of repositories that match the specified
filtering criteria.

get.description:
List all indexed repositories.

This endpoint returns a paginated list of all repositories in the system.

Get detailed information about a specific repository.

This endpoint returns comprehensive information about a repository,
including statistics and health metrics.

Get indexing pipeline statistics.

This endpoint returns comprehensive statistics about the indexing pipeline
and database contents.

post.description:
Optimize database indices for better performance.

This endpoint triggers optimization routines for both ChromaDB and Neo4j
to improve query performance.

Clean up old completed tasks.

This endpoint removes old task statuses to free up memory.

get.description:
Get comprehensive system information.

Returns detailed information about the system state, configuration,
and resource usage.

post.description:
Perform system maintenance operations.

Supports various maintenance operations like cleanup, optimization,
and data consistency checks.

Create system backup.

Creates backups of ChromaDB and Neo4j databases with optional compression.

get.description:
List all available backups.

Returns a list of all system backups with metadata.

post.description:
Restore from backup.

Restores the system from a specified backup.

get.description:
Get system logs.

Returns system logs with filtering and pagination.

Get system configuration.

Returns current system configuration settings.

post.description:
Update system configuration.

Updates system configuration settings (requires restart for some changes).

Clear system caches.

Clears various system caches to free memory and reset performance metrics.

get.description:
Get database schema information.

Returns schema information for the specified database.

post.description:
Shutdown the system gracefully.

Initiates a graceful shutdown of the application.

Restart the system.

Initiates a system restart.

get.description:
Get system alerts and warnings.

Returns current system alerts and warnings.

Return a normalized subgraph for a repository suitable for UI visualization.

Strategy:
- Start from (r:Repository {name: $repository})
- Expand variable length up to 'depth' following allowed relationships
- Filter node labels to allowed set, and relationships to allowed set
- Deduplicate nodes/edges and respect limits

parameters.name: trace

schema.description: Include sequential-thinking trace and log to memory MCP
schema.title: Trace

parameters.description: Include sequential-thinking trace and log to memory MCP

get.description:
Return a canonical multi-repo migration plan for the given repositories.
Delegates to the same planning logic used by POST /api/v1/query/multi-repo/migration-impact.
No fallbacks: raises 400/503 on errors.

parameters.name: repositories

schema.description: Comma-separated list of repository names, e.g. repo1,repo2
schema.title: Repositories

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of repository names, e.g. repo1,repo2

get.description:
Return the effective Neo4j configuration the API is using (MVP: includes password).
Intended strictly for local troubleshooting in development.
Execute a trivial connectivity probe against Neo4j to surface driver errors.
Get recent log entries.
Get error summary for the last N hours.

post.description: Clean up old log files.

get.description: Return critical app.state flags useful for diagnosing readiness issues.

BulkIndexRequest.title: BulkIndexRequest
BulkIndexRequest.description: Request model for bulk repository indexing.

LocalRepositoryIndexRequest.title: LocalRepositoryIndexRequest
LocalRepositoryIndexRequest.description: Request model for local repository indexing.

repository_names.title: Repository Names
repository_names.description: List of repository names to analyze

repositories.title: Repositories
repositories.description: Repositories in scope for this plan

RepositorySelectionRequest.title: RepositorySelectionRequest
RepositorySelectionRequest.description: Request model for repository selection and scoping.

SystemMaintenanceRequest.title: SystemMaintenanceRequest
SystemMaintenanceRequest.description: Request model for system maintenance operations.
